person_say: I've been stuck with no ideas for my writing. I really need some help to find inspiration.
animal_say: Are you looking for help organizing your ideas, or do you need a little boost to spark your creativity? I can connect you with the right friend to help!

person_say: I definitely need a little boost to spark my creativity. Please connect me with someone who can help!
animal_say: There's a buzzing bee named Bizy who specializes in procrastination and can help you get those creative juices flowing! Are you ready to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds wonderful! I would love to get some help to get my creative juices flowing.
animal_say: Fantastic! Here comes Bizy, the bee extraordinaire! She's all set to help you dive into your creativity and kick procrastination to the curb!
